### Chart A

```{r}
noaa_df %>% 
  filter(year == 1997:2001) %>%
  count(tmax) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~tmax, y = ~n, color = ~tmax, type = "bar", text = ~paste("Temp: ", tmax, "Count: ", n), colors = "viridis")
```
